Articles.Content: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT!! I'VE RECENTLY GONE NUTS DOWNLOADING PLANET PACKS AND THEY STILL WORK IN 1.1.2 AS LONG AS YOU HAVE THE PROPER VERSION OF KOPERNICUS! (Sorry for kaps)

Actual "PSA": Planet packs can impact framerate. With a few major packs all installed together I get about a 10% fps hit. (I'm keeping them, but I shan't add more just yet). It's not huge, but it's there, and other mods can impact fps too. It can easily add up even if each individual mod has only a minor effect.

Edited May 9, 2016 by cantab
